L2_gloss: Alternative form of paňi (“water; river, lake”)

Alternative form of paňi (“water”)
1903,  Franz Nikolaus Finck,  Lehrbuch des Dialekts der deutschen Zigeuner, Marburg, N. G. Elwert, OCLC 6712550, page 39:De man páni e grájeske.Give me water for the horse.
cross, Synonyms: cajxo, krajco, backbone, spine, acorns
